StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Over 1 years experience in Clinical Data Management, Clinical Research, Clinical Analysis, Research & Development, Biotechnology, Pharmacovigilance, Clinical Trials, Principal Investigator, Laboratory Testing, ICH-GCP

PositionHistory.Title: Clinical Research Data Entry Operator in Clinical Data Management
PositionHistory.Description: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES To coordinate with Principal Investigator to help ensure that clinical research and related activities are performed. To coordinate monitoring visit EC Submission. Completion of Paper CRF & e-CRF. Drug dispensing and Maintain the accountability Log. Arrange for prescribed laboratory tests, specialist referrals, and diagnostic procedures. Source Document. Daily Record minimum, actual, & maximum temperature of IP in monitoring temperature log sheet. EC communications that includes notifications of the protocol amendment, protocol deviations, investigator brochure etc. Tracking the status of all study activities.

sov:PositionHistoryUserArea.sov:NormalizedTitle: Clinical Research Data Entry Operator in Clinical Data Management

Degree.Comments: PG: Medical-MS/MD (Bio-Chemistry) from All India Management Association (AIMA) in 2017
UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Bio-Chemistry/Bio-Technology) from Maharishi Dayanand University (MDU), Rohtak in 2016
